summary: Brenton male mage follower by Penmage
descriptionHtml:
Vadim Magija is a mage who lives at the Winter Hold collage.
You can find him in the Archmage\'s chambers.

He will level up with you, won\'t affect sneaking, cannot die, and you can marry him if you wish.

His spells include- Fireball, Thunder bolt, Lighting cloak, Icy Spear, Bound Sword, Steadfast Ward, Iron Flesh, and will heal himself. He also has the shout ability of Ice Form, and Storm Call

Mods used for this result

1. High res face maps for men by Geonox http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141#content (first)
2.  Smoother faces for Imperials, Dark Elf, and Brenton (second) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971 Then Smooth Faces for Ladies and Gents, along with Wild Eyebrows begone- Darker version for males

3. Smooth Face V3 http://www.mediafire.com/?o9qfyt763d0qvkg
4. ApachiiskyHair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

5. The Eyes of Beauty http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
6.Better Males, Sundracon or Favoredsoul- whichever you like better http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488#content

7. HQ Beards http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21620
author: Penmage
